directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; rinse with cold water.
In large bowl combine pasta, celery, pepper, corn, apple, orange, chives, parsley, salt, pepper and mayonnaise.  Adjust seasonings.  Serve
ingredients: 1 large orange, peeled, sectioned, and cut into bite-size pieces
title: Fruity Macaroni Salad
